name.full: Find information for engineering lessons learned

description.short: Find information related to engineering lessons learned
description.full: This messaging extension is used to find data from Engineering Lessons learned Sharepoint list. The command will find data by keywords specified. The parameter will be the value in one of the columns in Sharepoint list

commands.title: Search
commands.description: Find in lessons learned by providing projectId, projectName, group

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.title: Project ID
parameters.description: Id of the project that you want to find in SharePoint list columns like: 241

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.title: Project Name
parameters.description: The name of the project you want to find in SharePoint list columns. For example BMW

parameters.name: group
parameters.title: Group
parameters.description: Group of the project that you want to find in SharePoint list columns like: JPS
